boost::numeric::ublas::fixed_matrix

Detailed Description

template<class T, std::size_t M, std::size_t N, class L = row_major>
class boost::numeric::ublas::fixed_matrix< T, M, N, L >

uBLAS compatible class template for matrices of fixed size.

This class implements a uBLAS compatible matrix class. The template parameters M and N specify the size of the matrix which have to be known at compile time. See uBLAS documentation for details.
